product_name: REI Woodland Fleece Vest - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The REI Woodland fleece plus-size, women's vest offers everyday performance at an affordable price. Made from a Polartec(R) midweight fleece, it features refined, contemporary styling. Polartec(R)Thermal Pro(R) breathable fleece stays warm even when damp, dries fast, and resists pilling and snagging; Durable Water Repellent finish repels rain and snow. Collar edge is rolled for comfort. Nicely finished, spandex-bound armholes. Features brushed tricot-lined zip hand pockets and drawcord hem. REI Woodland vest has an easy-wearing, classic fit.
short_description: The REI Woodland fleece plus-size, women's vest offers everyday performance at an affordable price. Made from a Polartec(R) midweight fleece, it features refined, contemporary styling.
